name: MSG the Warrior: Lion Heart
summary_text: The story is about medieval warrior who fights for the honor of his land and the dignity of the womenfolk. The story travels centuries apart as he emerges in another role as a modern Indian...                See full summary »

name: The Thing Called Love
summary_text: A group of newcomers to the country music business seek love and stardom.

name: Why Don't You Play in Hell?
summary_text: A renegade film crew becomes embroiled with a yakuza clan feud.

name: Possession
summary_text: A woman's life is thrown into chaos after a freak car accident sends her husband and brother-in-law into comas. Thrills arrive after the brother-in-law wakes up, thinking he's his brother.

name: Darby O'Gill and the Little People
summary_text: A wily old codger matches wits with the King of the Leprechauns and helps play matchmaker for his daughter and the strapping lad who has replaced him as caretaker.

name: Arabian Nights
summary_text: Ancient Arabia. A youth is chosen by a beautiful slave girl to be her new master; she is kidnapped and they must search for each other. Stories are told within stories; love, travel and the whims of destiny.

name: Vacancy 2: The First Cut
summary_text: Three young people check into the Meadow View Inn for a night's rest, fully unaware of the inn's sick-minded employees and their nefarious intentions.

name: Riders of Justice
summary_text: Markus, who has to go home to his teenage daughter, Mathilde, when his wife dies in a tragic train accident. It seems like an accident until a mathematics geek, who was also a fellow passenger on the train, and his two colleagues show up.

name: The Night of the Generals
summary_text: In 1942, a Polish prostitute and German Agent is murdered in Warsaw. Suspicion falls on three Generals, and Major Grau (Omar Sharif) of German Intelligence seeks justice which ends up taking decades.

name: Stromberg - Der Film
summary_text: The movie spin-off of the TV series centered around the incompetent boss of a German insurance office.

name: So Close
summary_text: A conflict of interest between two high-kicking assassin sisters is complicated as they're pursued by the criminals who hired them and an equally high-kicking female cop.

name: The Secret of Roan Inish
summary_text: Young Fiona lives with her grandparents in a small fishing village where she takes an active role to unravel the mysterious secrets.

name: October Baby
summary_text: A college freshman's world is rocked when she learns she is the adopted survivor of a failed abortion.

name: Liberty Stands Still
summary_text: Liberty, the wife of a gun manufacturer, is held hostage at a hot dog stand by a sniper seeking revenge.

name: Shooting Fish
summary_text: Two con artists' plan to steal enough for a house are twisted when a pretty girl enters the picture.

name: Curve
summary_text: A soon-to-be bride on her way to a wedding rehearsal is having second thoughts and decides to take a detour. Car breaks down and a hitchiker offers help. Could it be fate?

name: Passion Play
summary_text: An angel under the thumb of a ruthless gangster is saved by a trumpet player down on his luck.

name: Night of the Demons
summary_text: A group of kids go to a Halloween party, only to have to face down a group of demons.

name: Les garçons et Guillaume, à table!
summary_text: A young man named Guillaume finds out that own personality is not such a simple thing.

name: Saraband
summary_text: Marianne, some thirty years after divorcing Johan, decides to visit her ex-husband at his summer home. She arrives in the middle of a family drama between Johan's son from another marriage and his granddaughter.

name: Things to Come
summary_text: The story of a century: a decades-long second World War leaves plague and anarchy, then a rational state rebuilds civilization and attempts space travel.

name: Suburban Girl
summary_text: A Manhattanite book editor finds her take on the game of romance changed after she lures the attention of an influential older man.

name: The Acid House
summary_text: Three twisted tales of abuse, drugs, displaced personalities, and insect life by Scottish writer Irvine Welsh.

name: Brian's Song
summary_text: Based on the real-life relationship between teammates Brian Piccolo and Gale Sayers and the bond established when Piccolo discovers that he is dying.

name: Havana
summary_text: In 1950s Cuba, a professional gambler falls for a woman heavily involved in the revolution movement.

name: Lone Wolf and Cub: Sword of Vengeance
summary_text: The story of a Ronin (i.e. a masterless samurai) who wanders the countryside of Japan with his small child, having various adventures.

name: The Three Faces of Eve
summary_text: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.

name: When Worlds Collide
summary_text: As a new star and planet hurtle toward a doomed Earth, a small group of survivalists frantically work to complete the rocket which will take them to their new home.

name: The Piano Player
summary_text: Follows three men who are in love with a most beautiful waitress: An intellectual restaurant owner, a mysterious musician and an erratic businessman; taking place during the WWII.

name: A.C.A.B. - All Cops Are Bastards
summary_text: A look at the controversial riot cops unit, told through the stories of three veteran cops and a young recruit.

name: Small Apartments
summary_text: A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.

name: The Sicilian Clan
summary_text: A young, ambitious mobster plans an elaborate diamond heist while seducing the daughter of a ruthless mob patriarch as a determined police commissioner closes in on all of them.

name: The Life of Emile Zola
summary_text: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfuss Affair.

name: The Anomaly
summary_text: An ex-soldier named Ryan Reeve is taken captive by the "Anomaly" organization where he learns that he only has 9:47 minutes/seconds to find out why they want him dead.

name: Shirley Valentine
summary_text: Shirley is a 42-year-old Liverpudlian bored housewife, who takes a holiday trip to Greece, meeting a local man who bolsters her self-confidence. She evolves and transforms to the point of finally being unrecognizable by her husband.

name: Still Smokin
summary_text: Cheech and Chong fly to the marijuana capital of the world, Amsterdan, for a film festival where they take Dolly Parton and Burt Reynold's place in a limo, suite, press conference and performance. They throw in some sketches as well.

name: Husband Material
summary_text: A love triangle between a spirited young woman, her outgoing boyfriend and a fiance who's husband material.

name: John Mulaney: The Comeback Kid
summary_text: Armed with boyish charm and a sharp wit, the former SNL writer offers sly takes on marriage, his beef with babies and the time he met Bill Clinton.

name: Innocent Voices
summary_text: A young boy, in an effort to have a normal childhood in 1980's El Salvador, is caught up in a dramatic fight for his life as he desperately tries to avoid the war which is raging all around him.

name: Gothic
summary_text: The Shelleys visit Lord Byron and compete to write a horror story.

name: Ghosts of War
summary_text: Five American soldiers assigned to hold a French Chateau near the end of World War II. This unexpected respite quickly descends into madness when they encounter a supernatural enemy more terrifying than anything seen on the battlefield.

name: Birth of the Dragon
summary_text: Set against the backdrop of 1960s San Francisco, BIRTH OF THE DRAGON is a modern take on the classic movies that Bruce Lee was known for. It takes its inspiration from the epic and still controversial showdown between an up-and-coming Bruce Lee and kung fu master Wong Jack Man - a battle that gave birth to a legend.

name: Veer
summary_text: Prithvi seeks revenge on Gyanendra Singh and the British. He sends his son Veer to Britain to study their plans. Veer kills Gyanendra's son but ends up falling in love with his daughter.

name: King of Kings
summary_text: The temporary physical life of the Biblical Savior, Jesus Christ.

name: Fellini's Casanova
summary_text: The myth of Giacomo Casanova, the notorious womanizer is presented as a pitiable and terrifying figure. A sex scandal lands him in prison, but an escape to Paris provides him a new lease of life.

name: The Cut
summary_text: In 1915 a man survives the Armenian genocide in the Ottoman Empire, but loses his family, speech and faith. One night he learns that his twin daughters may be alive, and goes on a quest to find them.

name: The Tracey Fragments
summary_text: 15-year-old Tracey Berkowitz is naked under a shower curtain at the back of a bus, looking for her little brother Sonny, who thinks he's a dog.

name: Johnson Family Vacation
summary_text: Buckle up for the wildest road trip of the year. A comedy adventure about a misfit family trying to survive outrageous obstacles (includeing each other) on a cross-country trek to their annual family reunion.

name: Secret Sunshine
summary_text: A woman moves to the town where her dead husband was born. As she tries to fit in, another tragic event overturns her life.

name: Our House
summary_text: A young genius accidentally invents a device that amplifies the paranormal activity within his family's house, possibly bringing back the spirits of loved ones, and unleashing things far worse.

name: Ted Bundy
summary_text: The story of serial killer Ted Bundy.

name: Caro diario
summary_text: Director Nanni Moretti takes a mordant look at Italian life through three antological vignettes presented as the chapters of an open diary.

name: Far from Men
summary_text: Algeria, 1954. Two very different men thrown together by a world in turmoil are forced to flee across the Atlas mountains. Daru, the reclusive teacher, has to escort Mohamed, a villager accused of murder.

name: Smoke & Mirrors
summary_text: The story of a man who fooled an entire country. A tale of cheats and impostors, taking its inspiration from true facts and from one of the most intriguing characters of recent decades: the spy Francisco Paesa.

name: Unfinished Song
summary_text: Grumpy pensioner Arthur honors his recently deceased wife's passion for performing by joining the unconventional local choir to which she used to belong, a process that helps him build bridges with his estranged son, James.

name: Don't Come Knocking
summary_text: An aging cowboy movie star deserts a film set and tries to reconnect with his mother, whom he hasn't seen in thirty years, only to learn that he has a child he never knew about.

name: Every Secret Thing
summary_text: A detective looks to unravel a mystery surrounding missing children and the prime suspects: two young women who, seven years ago, were put away for an infant's death.

name: At Any Price
summary_text: A farming family's business is threatened by an unexpected crisis, further testing the relationship between a father and his rebellious son.

name: Cobra Verde
summary_text: During the 1800s, paroled Brazilian bandit Cobra Verde is sent to West Africa with a few troops to man an old Portuguese fort and to convince the local African ruler to resume the slave trade with Brazil.

name: Rubinrot
summary_text: On her 16th birthday, Gwendolyn Shepherd finds out that instead of her cousin, she has inherited a rare gene that allows her to travel through time.

name: The Bells of St. Mary's
summary_text: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

name: Gantz
summary_text: After trying to rescue a man on the subway tracks, two teens wake up in a room dominated by a mysterious black sphere that sends them to hunt down and kill aliens hiding on Earth.

name: Best Laid Plans
summary_text: A botched robbery leads two crooks and an unwitting buddy into a web of passion, crime and murder in this twist-laden film noir.

name: For Colored Girls
summary_text: Each of the women portray one of the characters represented in the collection of twenty poems, revealing different issues that impact women in general and women of color in particular.

name: Hopscotch
summary_text: Grounded with a desk job by incompetent superiors, a clever CIA agent retires and writes a tell all memoir that will embarrass his bosses, prompting him to go on the run and elude them.

name: Empire
summary_text: A successful South Bronx drug dealer turns his back on his roots and gives money to a Wall Street broker to invest for him.

name: Invaders from Mars
summary_text: A young boy learns that space aliens are taking over the minds of earthlings.

name: F.I.S.T.
summary_text: A rebellious Cleveland warehouse worker rises through the ranks of a trucking industry union to become union president but his organized crime links cause his eventual downfall.

name: Derailed
summary_text: On an out of control train holding hostages and high-tech bio-weapons agent Kristoff (Van Damme) becomes a one man army to derail the terrorists and save the lives of everyone on board!

name: Sui Dhaaga: Made in India
summary_text: An unemployed small-town man defies all odds and naysayers and starts his own garment business.

name: Lover Come Back
summary_text: A series of misunderstandings leaves an advertising executive with a campaign for a product which has not yet been invented, while he romances his rival in the guise of its inventor.

name: Extortion
summary_text: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a cold-blooded fisherman, and a desperate race against the clock to save his wife and son.

name: I Want Candy
summary_text: Two film students with no experience nor money want to make a film. They can only get financing for a porn film with porn star Candy.

name: Foolish
summary_text: 2 brothers try to make it in the comedy business. The kid brother "Foolish"/Eddie Griffin does a lot of stand-up comedy.

name: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
summary_text: The story of a hooded, berserk killer who terrorized the border town of Texarkana, Arkansas in 1946--leaving no fewer than five murder victims in his wake. He was never caught. Based on one of America's most baffling murder cases.

name: The Girl on the Train
summary_text: The story follows a recent divorcee who spends her daily commute fantasizing about a seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes daily, but something shocking happens there one day.

name: Up for Love
summary_text: A lawyer dating a dashing, wealthy architect four and a half feet tall gets ribbed by her family, employees and jealous ex about his stature.

name: They Drive by Night
summary_text: When one of two truck-driving brothers loses an arm, they both join a transport company where the other is falsely charged as an accessory in the murder of the owner.

name: 12:08 East of Bucharest
summary_text: A local talk show host organizes an alcoholic professor and a pensioner known for playing Santa Claus to decide whether there was ever a revolution in their town Vaslui.

name: Amar Akbar Anthony
summary_text: Three brothers are separated and united after many years - one is brought up a Hindu, another a Muslim and the last (and most memorable) a Christian. Hilarity and adventure ensues.

name: My Hero Academia: Two Heroes
summary_text: All Might and Deku accept an invitation to visit I Island where they battle against a villain who takes the island hostage.

name: Master Z: The Ip Man Legacy
summary_text: While keeping a low profile after his defeat by Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi gets into trouble after getting in a fight with a powerful foreigner.

name: Hard Kill
summary_text: The work of billionaire tech CEO Donovan Chalmers (Willis) is so valuable that he hires mercenaries to protect it, and a terrorist group kidnaps his daughter just to get it.

name: Control
summary_text: A sociopath on death row is given a chance to live if he agrees to take part in a chemical behavioral modification program.

name: Queen Christina
summary_text: Queen Christina of Sweden is a popular monarch who is loyal to her country. However, when she falls in love with a Spanish envoy, she must choose between the throne and the man she loves.

name: Stachka
summary_text: A group of oppressed factory workers go on strike in pre-revolutionary Russia.

name: Raju Ban Gaya Gentleman
summary_text: Raju comes to Bombay chasing his dreams, but keeps losing out on opportunities. His love, Renu helps him find a job. Success goes to his head until one day a tragic accident destroys his reputation.

name: The Harvest
summary_text: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door.

name: Barefoot Gen
summary_text: A powerful statement against war, Barefoot Gen is a disturbing story about the effect of the atomic bomb on a boy's life and the lives of the Japanese people.

name: The Harder They Fall
summary_text: An ex-sportswriter is hired by a shady fight promoter to promote his latest find, an unknown but easily exploitable rising star from Argentina.

name: Manglehorn
summary_text: Left heartbroken by the woman he loved and lost many years ago, Manglehorn, an eccentric small-town locksmith, tries to start his life over again with the help of a new friend.

name: Tales from the Hood
summary_text: A funeral director tells four strange tales of horror with an African American focus to three drug dealers he traps in his place of business.

name: The Anderson Tapes
summary_text: After Duke Anderson is released from prison after ten years for taking the rap for a scion of a Mafia family, he cashes in a debt of honor with the mob to bankroll a caper.

name: Sarkar Raj
summary_text: An even more powerful gang emerges to wipe out Sarkar from the playground. A power plant proposal becomes a cause for greater political turmoil around him. What happens to the Family?

name: Polyester
summary_text: A suburban housewife's world falls apart when she finds that her pornographer husband is serially unfaithful to her, her daughter is pregnant, and her son is suspected of being the foot-fetishist who's been breaking local women's feet.

name: Why Stop Now?
summary_text: When a college piano prodigy tries to check his mother into rehab, he is taken hostage by her drug dealer and swept along on a wild adventure.

name: Arizona
summary_text: Set in the midst of the 2009 housing crisis, this darkly comedic story follows Cassie Fowler, a single mom and struggling realtor whose life goes off the rails when she witnesses a murder.

name: The Dreamlife of Angels
summary_text: The lives of two dissimilar girls turned out in different ways.

name: Playing God
summary_text: A disgraced surgeon leaves his former life and reinvents himself as a gunshot doctor in the criminal underworld.

name: Anaconda 3: Offspring
summary_text: A mercenary-for-hire accepts a mission from a billionaire to capture a dangerous snake that could possibly help cure a terminal illness.

name: Do You Believe?
summary_text: When a pastor is shaken by the visible faith of a street corner preacher, he is reminded that true belief always requires action. His response ignites a journey that impacts everyone it touches in ways that only God could orchestrate.

name: The Neighbor
summary_text: Set in Cutter Mississippi, the film follows a man who discovers the dark truth about his neighbor and the secrets he may be keeping in the cellar.

name: Final Prayer
summary_text: A team of Vatican investigators descend upon a church in a remote area to demystify the unusual happenings, but what they discover is more disturbing than they had first imagined.

name: Summer Hours
summary_text: Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession.

name: The Dead
summary_text: Gabriel Conroy and wife Greta attend an early January dinner with friends at the home of his spinster aunts, an evening which results in an epiphany for both of them.

name: Dementia 13
summary_text: Shocked by the death of her spouse, a scheming widow hatches a bold plan to get her hands on the inheritance, unaware that she is targeted by an axe-wielding murderer who lurks in the family's estate. What mystery shrouds the noble house?

name: The Old Man and the Sea
summary_text: An old Cuban fisherman's dry spell is broken when he hooks a gigantic fish that drags him out to sea.

name: Gallowwalkers
summary_text: A cursed gunman (Snipes) whose victims come back from the dead recruits a young warrior to help in the fight against a gang of zombies.

name: The Mirror Crack'd
summary_text: Miss Jane Marple comes to solve the mystery when a local woman is poisoned and a visiting movie star seems to have been the intended victim.

name: Gleaming the Cube
summary_text: A young avid skateboarder uncovers a government conspiracy while investigating his adoptive brother's mysterious death.

name: The Courier
summary_text: A courier in London discovers that one of the packages she's transporting is a bomb.

name: Red Riding: The Year of Our Lord 1983
summary_text: Plagued by guilt, a corrupt police official attempts to solve the case of a missing schoolgirl after seeing connections between her disappearance and a rash of prior abductions.

name: Stanley & Iris
summary_text: A struggling widow falls in love with an illiterate short-order cook whom she teaches to read and write in her kitchen each night.

name: Ridicule
summary_text: To get royal backing on a needed drainage project, a poor French lord must learn to play the delicate games of wit at court at Versailles.

name: Soul Food
summary_text: One person can keep a family together and, when that one person is gone, a family can be torn apart.

name: Eating Raoul
summary_text: A relatively boring Los Angeles couple discovers a bizarre, if not murderous, way to get funding for opening a restaurant.

name: Blame!
summary_text: In the distant future, humans are declared "illegal residents" and hunted to near extinction by murderous robots. One day, a group of human scavengers come across a strange man named Killy, who may be the key to humanity's survival.

name: Search Party
summary_text: A pair of friends embark on a mission to reunite their pal with the woman he was going to marry.

name: The Bridge
summary_text: In 1945, Germany is being overrun, and nobody is left to fight but teenagers.

name: Babysitter Wanted
summary_text: In a small college town, a young girl working on a babysitting job in a rural farm is terrorized throughout the night.

name: The Collector
summary_text: A womanizing art dealer and a painter find the serenity of their Riviera vacation disturbed by a third guest, a vivacious bohemian woman known for her long list of male conquests.

name: Samson and Delilah
summary_text: When strongman Samson rejects the love of the beautiful Philistine woman Delilah, she seeks vengeance that brings horrible consequences they both regret.

name: Panic in the Streets
summary_text: A doctor and a policeman in New Orleans have only 48 hours to locate a killer infected with pneumonic plague.

name: Hollow
summary_text: On holiday in the English countryside, two young couples uncover an ancient evil.

name: Libeled Lady
summary_text: When a socialite sues a big paper for libel, the editor responsible calls in the help of his ignored fiancée and a former employee to frame her and make the false story seem true.

name: Hyena Road
summary_text: Three different men, three different worlds, three different wars - all stand at the intersection of modern warfare - a murky world of fluid morality where all is not as it seems.

name: Children's Party
summary_text: A gang of innocent but feisty kids who lead carefree lives in Chandan Nagar colony takes on the big bad world of politics when one of their friend's life is endangered.

name: It's Alive
summary_text: The Davies expect a baby, which turns out to be a monster with a nasty habit of killing when it's scared. And it's easily scared.

name: Hellraiser: Revelations
summary_text: Two college friends unwittingly release Pinhead and his minions.

name: White Sands
summary_text: A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.

name: The Great Father
summary_text: A businessman who is trying hard to be a good father to his daughter has a run-in with malevolent policeman.

name: Come as You Are
summary_text: Three guys in their twenties love wine and women but they are still virgins. Under the guise of a wine tour they embark on a journey to Spain hoping to have their first sexual experience. ...                See full summary »

name: The Plague Dogs
summary_text: Two dogs escape from a laboratory and are hunted as possible carriers of the bubonic plague.

name: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn
summary_text: Encouraged by her idealistic if luckless father, a bright and imaginative young woman comes of age in a Brooklyn tenement during the early 1900s.

name: Alien Autopsy
summary_text: Humoristic reconstruction of the 1995 scandal related to the fake documentary The Alien Autopsy (1995) about the Roswell incident.

name: Kiss Me, Stupid
summary_text: Jealous piano teacher Orville Spooner sends his beautiful wife, Zelda, away for the night while he tries to sell a song to famous nightclub singer Dino, who is stranded in town.

name: Godzilla: King of the Monsters!
summary_text: A 400-foot (122-meter) dinosaur-like beast, awoken from undersea hibernation off the Japanese coast by atomic-bomb testing, attacks Tokyo.

name: Major Dundee
summary_text: In 1864, due to frequent Apache raids from Mexico into the U.S., a Union officer decides to illegally cross the border and destroy the Apache, using a mixed army of Union troops, Confederate POWs, civilian mercenaries, and scouts.

name: The Broken Hearts Club: A Romantic Comedy
summary_text: An insight into the turbulent lives and loves of a gay clique based in Los Angeles.

name: Beloved
summary_text: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman

name: Major League: Back to the Minors
summary_text: Major League: Back to the Minors. On this team they don't just throw screwballs, they put them in uniform!

name: Mr. Nice
summary_text: The life story of Howard Marks, an elite British drug smuggler.

name: Irina Palm
summary_text: Maggie, a 60-year-old widow, desperately needs some money to pay for a medical treatment for her ill grandson, Olly. After one attempt at trying to find a job, she finds herself roaming the...                See full summary »

name: Term Life
summary_text: A guy wanted around town by various hitmen hopes to stay alive long enough for his life insurance policy to kick in and pay out for his estranged daughter.

name: Force
summary_text: A vengeful gangster targets and terrorizes an entire police unit and their families.

name: Le gendarme se marie
summary_text: The gendarme Cruchot meets the widow Josepha. They quickly fall in love but Cruchot's daughter doesn't like Josepha and is determined to prevent the wedding by all means necessary.

name: The Kid
summary_text: The story of a young boy who witnesses Billy the Kid's encounter with Sheriff Pat Garrett.

name: Roy
summary_text: Successful film-maker Kabir meets with Ayesha and falls in love. He suffers a heartbreak when she leaves him. Meanwhile, a thief named Roy undergoes a change of heart when he experiences love.

name: The Postcard Killings
summary_text: A New York detective investigates the death of his daughter who was murdered while on her honeymoon in London; he recruits the help of a Scandinavian journalist when other couples throughout Europe suffer a similar fate.

name: Delhi-6
summary_text: In the ancient walled city of Delhi, an American-born Indian finds himself on an unexpected inner journey as he learns about himself and his roots.

name: Stone Cold
summary_text: A tough Alabama cop is blackmailed by the FBI into going undercover in a violent Mississippi biker gang.

name: Cyberbully
summary_text: A British teenager is forced by a computer hacker to do his bidding. If she refuses, the hacker will leak compromising photos of her to the public.

name: Reconstruction
summary_text: A young man who thought himself already in love with a nice girl is drawn into a literary drama when he is captured by a deep and stimulating love affair.

name: Battle for Haditha
summary_text: An investigation of the massacre of 24 men, women and children in Haditha, Iraq allegedly shot by 4 U.S. Marines in retaliation for the death of a U.S. Marine killed by a roadside bomb. The movie follows the story of the Marines of Kilo Company, an Iraqi family, and the insurgents who plant the roadside bomb.

name: Puzzle
summary_text: Agnes, taken for granted as a suburban mother, discovers a passion for solving jigsaw puzzles which unexpectedly draws her into a new world - where her life unfolds in ways she could never have imagined.

name: Wish Upon a Star
summary_text: A younger sister wishes to switch places with her popular older sister and the two bickering siblings awaken to find the wish has come true.

name: October (Ten Days that Shook the World)
summary_text: A large-scale view on the events of 1917 in Russia, when the monarchy was overthrown.

name: Caveman
summary_text: A caveman seeks revenge on a much larger competitor for the hand of a beautiful cavewoman.

name: The Paper Chase
summary_text: A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and his relationship with the daughter of his sternest professor.

name: I Married a Witch
summary_text: A beautiful 17th-century witch returns to life to plague politician Wallace Wooley, descendant of her persecutor.

name: White Material
summary_text: Amidst turmoil and racial conflict in a Francophone African state, a white French woman fights for her coffee crop, her family and ultimately for her life.

name: Frances
summary_text: The story of Frances Farmer's meteoric rise to fame in Hollywood and the tragic turn her life took when she was blacklisted.

name: Fisherman's Friends
summary_text: Ten fisherman from Cornwall are signed by Universal Records and achieve a top ten hit with their debut album of Sea Shanties.

name: Q
summary_text: NYPD detectives Shepard and Powell are working on a bizarre case of a ritualistic Aztec murder. Meanwhile, something big is attacking people of New York and only greedy small time crook Jimmy Quinn knows where its lair is.

name: Qarib Qarib Single
summary_text: Yogi and Jaya, who have polar opposite personalities and sensibilities, meet via a online dating app. This encounter turns into so much more when the two travel to Rishikesh.

name: Agent Vinod
summary_text: A series of seemingly unconnected events across the world leads to Agent Vinod undertaking a globe-trotting mission to discover why his colleague was murdered.

name: The 4th Man
summary_text: A man who has been having visions of an impending danger begins an affair with a woman who may lead him to his doom.

name: The Narrow Margin
summary_text: A woman planning to testify against the mob must be protected against their assassins on the train trip from Chicago to Los Angeles.

name: Cabin Fever: Patient Zero
summary_text: When a group of friends enjoying a bachelor cruise in the Caribbean stumble upon a research facility on a remote island, a deadly virus is unleashed. The group must find a way to survive before the flesh eating virus consumes them all.

name: De De Pyaar De
summary_text: A 50-year-old single father faces disapproval from his family and his ex-wife when he falls in love with a 26-year-old woman.

name: Maheshinte Prathikaaram
summary_text: Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

name: Ilsa: She Wolf of the SS
summary_text: Ilsa is an evil Nazi warden at a death camp that conducts "medical experiments." Ilsa's goal is to prove women can withstand more pain and suffering than men, and therefore should be allowed to fight on the front lines.

name: Welcome
summary_text: Bilal sets off on an adventure-filled journey across Europe and wants to get to England to see his love who lives there.

name: Cobb
summary_text: A reporter hired to write the 'official' biography of Ty Cobb discovers just how dark the baseball legend's real story is.

name: Bokeh
summary_text: On a romantic getaway to Iceland, a young American couple wake up one morning to discover every person on earth has disappeared. Their struggle to survive and to reconcile the mysterious ...                See full summary »

name: Vedam
summary_text: A terrorist threat puts five people in jeopardy.

name: Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ
summary_text: A Jewish prince seeks to find his family and revenge himself upon his childhood friend who had him wrongly imprisoned.

name: Bill Burr: I'm Sorry You Feel That Way
summary_text: Comedian Bill Burr's 2014 stand-up comedy special.

name: Bleeder
summary_text: Two stories for the price of one: Lenny works in a video shop and tries to get aquainted with the waitress Lea. Leo beats his pregnant wife, Louise, which is a VERY bad idea, as her brother, Louis, is a violent racist.

name: The Witch: Part 1 - The Subversion
summary_text: A high school student with amnesia tries to uncover what has happened to her. All leading her into deeper troubles ultimately revealing a darkness she could not have imagined.

name: The Church
summary_text: An old Gothic cathedral, built over a mass grave, develops strange powers which trap a number of people inside with ghosts from a 12th Century massacre seeking to resurrect an ancient demon from the bowels of the Earth.

name: Night of the Wolf
summary_text: When deadly beasts attack from the forest, it is up to a grizzled veteran to uncover what the residents of a secluded retirement community are hiding.

name: Daddy's Little Girls
summary_text: A mechanic falls in love with his attorney.

name: Death Wish: The Face of Death
summary_text: Paul Kersey is back at working vigilante justice when his fiancée, Olivia, has her business threatened by mobsters.

name: Code of Silence
summary_text: A Chicago cop is caught in the middle of a gang war while his own comrades shun him because he wants to take down an irresponsible cop.

name: Earth vs. the Flying Saucers
summary_text: Extraterrestrials traveling in high-tech flying saucers contact a scientist as part of a plan to enslave the inhabitants of Earth.

name: Extreme Job
summary_text: A police undercover operation takes a delicious, unexpected turn.

name: The Gay Divorcee
summary_text: A woman thinks a flirting man is the co-respondent her lawyer has hired to expedite her divorce.

name: Clinical
summary_text: A psychiatrist tries to put her life back together after a violent attack by seeking to repair the life of a new patient, but he has his own terrifying history.

name: Elizabeth Harvest
summary_text: A brilliant man marries a beautiful woman and shows her his home, stating that it's all hers - except a room she can't enter. First chance she enters and discovers what might be human cloning. When the husband returns she pays the price.

name: About Alex
summary_text: When a group of old college friends reunite over a long weekend after one of them attempts suicide, old crushes and resentments shine light on their life decisions, and ultimately push friendships and relationships to the brink.

name: Napoleon
summary_text: A film about the French general's youth and early military career.

name: Drifting Clouds
summary_text: The recession hits a couple in Helsinki.

name: Golmaal Returns
summary_text: A man is sandwiched between his over possessive wife and a police inspector, where he is suspected for adultery and murder.

name: Real Women Have Curves
summary_text: In East Los Angeles, an 18-year-old struggles between her ambitions of going to college and the desires of her domineering mother for her to get married, have children, and oversee the small, rundown family-owned textile factory.

name: Bomb City
summary_text: Bomb City is a crime-thriller, about the cultural aversion of a group of punk rockers in a conservative Texas town. Their ongoing battle with a rival, more-affluent clique leads to a ...                See full summary »

name: Aravindha Sametha
summary_text: A young scion of a powerful family with a long history of violence decides to put an end to the bloodshed which leads him to a path of self discovery.

name: Piglet's Big Movie
summary_text: When Piglet comes up missing his Hundred Acre Wood friends use Piglet's own Book of Memories to find him, discovering along the way just how big a role he's played in their lives.

name: Women in Love
summary_text: Two best friends fall in love with a pair of women, but the relationships soon go in very different directions.

name: The House of Mirth
summary_text: A woman risks losing her chance of happiness with the only man she has ever loved.

name: Mo' Money
summary_text: A petty crook stalks a cute girl into an office building and is taken for a job applicant. Conning gets him the job. It's in the mail room of new credit cards. 2 superiors are worse crooks.

name: Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger
summary_text: Sinbad The Sailor sails to deliver a cursed prince to a dangerous island in the face of deadly opposition from a powerful witch.

name: The Cocoanuts
summary_text: During the Florida land boom, The Marx Brothers run a hotel, auction off some land, thwart a jewel robbery, and generally act like themselves.

name: I Capture the Castle
summary_text: A love story set in 1930s England that follows 17-year-old Cassandra Mortmain, and the fortunes of her eccentric family, struggling to survive in a decaying English castle.

name: Taboo
summary_text: The new member of a samurai militia unit causes disruption as several of his colleagues fall in love with him, threatening to disturb the rigid code of their squad.

name: Raja Hindustani
summary_text: Raja, a taxi driver, falls in love with Aarti, a rich girl, and marries her against her parents' wishes. Later, her parents try to create differences amongst the couple.

name: Befikre
summary_text: What starts as a crazy one-night stand ends up in a relationship. But Dharam and Shyra fall out of love just as quickly. Where will life take them now?

name: No Mercy
summary_text: Despite being nearly proven the murderer, a serial killer threatens to kill the daughter of a forensic pathologist if he doesn't get him bailed out.

name: Asterix in America
summary_text: Caesar has had enough when another legion is hacked to pieces by the damned single indomitable village in Gaul because of the druid's magic potion, so he decides to tackle the problem at ...                See full summary »

name: Finding 'Ohana
summary_text: A summer in rural O‘ahu takes an exciting turn for two Brooklyn-raised siblings when a journal pointing to long-lost treasure sets them on an epic adventure with new friends, and leads them to reconnect with their Hawaiian heritage.

name: The Dry
summary_text: Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken hometown to attend a tragic funeral. But his return opens a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl.

name: Cats Don't Dance
summary_text: Danny, an ambitious singing and dancing cat, goes to Hollywood and overcomes several obstacles to fulfill his dream of becoming a movie star.

name: Tuntematon sotilas
summary_text: The tale of a platoon of soldiers during the Continuation War. Based on Väinö Linna's book of the same name.

name: The Specials
summary_text: The story of two men, educators of children and adolescents with autism.

name: Duplicate
summary_text: In order to evade the law, a ruthless don tries to kill his lookalike; a chef and tries to take his place.

name: Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day
summary_text: The boys return from jail to find the park has deteriorated, with a brand new park being created beside it. They attempt a series of get rich quick schemes and robberies, while a freshly drunk Lahey threatens to derail their plans.

name: Cherrybomb
summary_text: Three teenagers go on a wild weekend of drink, drugs, shop-lifting and stealing cars that quickly spins beyond their control.

name: Jump In!
summary_text: A teenager is pressured by his father to become a boxer - but a local girl introduces him to the very different sport of rope-jumping.

name: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
summary_text: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and, ultimately, New York City.

name: Man of the West
summary_text: A reformed outlaw becomes stranded after an aborted train robbery with two other passengers and is forced to rejoin his old outlaw band.

name: Bad Cat
summary_text: A profane house cat must deal with the arrival of his illegitimate son, an accidental killing, his owner's eviction and more within the course of a day of debauchery and mayhem.

name: Music Box
summary_text: A lawyer defends her father accused of war crimes, but there is more to the case than she suspects.

name: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio
summary_text: In order to support her ten children, Evelyn Ryan enters a commercial jingle-writing contest.

name: The Terror
summary_text: A young officer in Napoleon's Army pursues a mysterious woman to the castle of an elderly Baron.

name: Naked Weapon
summary_text: 40 13 y.o. girls are kidnapped and the next 6 years forcefully trained to be sexy assassins. The survivors go on to be top int'l assassins known as China dolls. A CIA agent's on track of them.

name: What Keeps You Alive
summary_text: Majestic mountains, a still lake and venomous betrayals engulf a female married couple attempting to celebrate their one-year anniversary.

name: Desperate Hours
summary_text: An escaped con, on the run from the law, moves into a married couple's house and takes over their lives.

name: Small Crimes
summary_text: A disgraced former cop, fresh off a six-year prison sentence for attempted murder - returns home looking for redemption but winds up trapped in the mess he left behind.
While on a routine patrol, an aging cop, his partner and their ride-along get caught in a standoff with a band of former mercenaries robbing a bank.

name: Hulchul
summary_text: A man and woman from feuding families each pretend to fall in love, as part of a revenge plot. Chaos ensues when their fake romance becomes a reality.

name: The King
summary_text: A troubled man, recently discharged from the Navy, goes to Corpus Christi, Texas, in search of the father he's never met.

name: Even Cowgirls Get the Blues
summary_text: Sissy Hankshaw (Uma Thurman) is born with enormous thumbs that help her hitchhiking through the U.S. from a young age. She becomes a model in advertising, and her New York agent, "the ...                See full summary »

name: Fat Man and Little Boy
summary_text: This film reenacts the Manhattan Project, the secret wartime project in New Mexico where the first atomic bombs were designed and built.

name: Starlet
summary_text: An unlikely friendship forms between twenty-one-year-old Jane and the elderly Sadie after Jane discovers a hidden stash of money inside an object at Sadie's yard sale.

name: Ministry of Fear
summary_text: Stephen Neale has just been released from an asylum during World War II in England when he accidentally stumbles onto a deadly Nazi spy plot, and tries to stop it.

name: Nice Dreams
summary_text: Disguised as ice cream vendors, Cheech and Chong make--and subsequently lose--millions of dollars selling a batch of marijuana with an unusual side effect.

name: The Ascent
summary_text: Two Soviet partisans on a mission to gather food contend with the winter cold, the occupying Germans, and their own psyches.

name: Under Fire
summary_text: Three journalists in a romantic triangle are involved in political intrigue during the last days of the corrupt Somozoa regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

name: Beautiful Lies
summary_text: A hairdresser forwards a passionate love letter to her mother.

name: The Nameless
summary_text: 5 years after a mom's 6 y.o. girl is murdered, she gets a phone call from someone claiming to be the daughter. An ex cop and a reporter help. A secret group called The Nameless may be behind it all.

name: Pizza
summary_text: A pizza delivery boy lands in a mysterious circumstance and it works a dramatic change in his life.

name: Cinderella
summary_text: Although mistreated by her cruel stepmother and stepsisters, Cinderella is able to attend the royal ball through the help of a fairy godmother.

name: Baaria
summary_text: Baaria is Sicilian slang for Bagheria where Tornatore was born and this is an autobiographic epic of three generations in the Sicilian village where he was born.

name: Tarzan the Ape Man
summary_text: A trader and his daughter set off in search of the fabled graveyard of the elephants in deepest Africa, only to encounter a wild man raised by apes.

name: The Crucifixion
summary_text: When Nicole comes in contact with Father Anton (Corneliu Ulici) more and more inexplicable events occur. The pair begin to believe that the priest lost the battle with a demon.

name: North to Alaska
summary_text: During the Alaska gold rush, prospector George sends partner Sam to Seattle to bring his fiancée but when it turns out that she married another man, Sam returns with a pretty substitute, the hostess of the Henhouse dance hall.

name: Bhavesh Joshi Superhero
summary_text: The origin story of Bhavesh Joshi, an Indian superhero, who sets out to fulfill his slain friend's wish to clean and reform the country, by training himself to fight and wearing a mask.

name: Viceroy's House
summary_text: The final Viceroy of India, Louis Francis Albert Victor Nicholas Mountbatten, 1st Earl Mountbatten of Burma (Hugh Bonneville), is tasked with overseeing the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as different sides clash in the face of monumental change.

name: War Witch
summary_text: Somewhere in Sub-Saharan Africa, Komona, a 14-year-old girl, tells her unborn child growing inside her the story of her life since she has been at war. Everything started when she was abducted by the rebel army at the age of 12.

name: Soldiers of Fortune
summary_text: Wealthy thrill-seekers pay huge premiums to have themselves inserted into military adventures, only this time things don't go exactly to plan.
